h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Xiang River Goddess Gourd Location
content: The Xiang River Goddess Gourd can be found within The Verdure Bridge Shrine location in The Webbed Hollow. From the Shrine, follow the path towards the lanterns on the left. Head through the opening on the right by them and open one of the chests in the area to get the Gourd.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Xiang_River_Goddess_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Xiang River Goddess Gourd', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Xiang River Goddess Gourd Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Xiang River Goddess Gourd can be found within The Verdure Bridge Shrine location in The Webbed Hollow. From the Shrine, follow the path towards the lanterns on the left. Head through the opening on the right by them and open one of the chests in the area to get the Gourd.
